channel.title: Java is not recognized as an internal or external or batch file
channel.description:
I need some help with this. Everytime i run my server I get a problem stating that java is not recognized as an internal or external command or batch file. The problem started happening after i updated my jdk to update 23. Ive read all kinds of tuts telling me that I needed to set my path but when i try it still doesnt work. I also restored my computer to an earlier point in time when it was working(didnt work). At the moment i Have jdk 21, If anyone could help me I'd appreciate it thanks.
PS- IDk if i was setting my path right.

item.title: Java is not recognized as an internal or external or batch file
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

enviromental varibles need to be set for your jdk.

Read full topic
